W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_SIUG_RAKUGAKU_010_DETAIL.text: Kaoruko Hachijo is here. Perhaps you should try talking to her.

W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_SIUG_MIYAKOUNIV_INFO_010_DETAIL.text: Someone captivating is in this area.

W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_SIUG_HOTEL_INFO_010_DETAIL.text: Someone captivating is in this area.

W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_SIUG_DANGEROUS_CAVE_000_DETAIL.text: You hear droplets from within the cave, indicating it's made of limestone. A clue about Lifetaker's darkness can be found here.

W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: Lifetaker once killed someone in this world, and it's time to reveal the darkness inside him. But a rude man suddenly calls out to you, leading you to believe this world truly has no end of darkness. How fascinating.
